summary: Training script for a scene‑graph relationship detection model built on MXNet/GluonCV. It parses command‑line options, prepares the visual relationship dataset, constructs a Faster R-CNN backbone combined with a RelDN head, and runs the training loop with loss computation, periodic evaluation, logging and checkpoint saving.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑run pipeline for researchers and engineers to train and fine‑tune relationship detection networks, enabling advanced image understanding applications such as scene‑graph generation and visual relationship inference.
